messages.content: Are you available next week for a discovery meeting?
Can we confirm next Wednesday at 4pm?
We have plans every day. Including lunch. I will let you know if anything changes.
The discovery tool and process are free of charge. We're evaluating special long time customers. Our other customers have noticed the benefit of our tool which evaluates each item on the network.
That might be agreeable given the price.
Well thank you for your time. The team and I will see you on the confirmed date and time.
I look forward to the outcome.
The reason for my call is to demonstrate our new Discovery tool and process.
We have Microsoft's discovery tool which is called SCCM and a few others.
I am from Makeit Right Advertising?
I am Alex Morgan the head of Marketing.
Are you available next Wednesday at 4pm?
Yes I am. I will need a confirmation.
